message.content: This question requires knowledge about the capabilities of a balance. A balance is a measuring instrument used to determine the weight of objects. It can measure the weight of sugar, tea, salt water, chocolate milk, and any other substance or object. Options (B), (C), and (D) are incorrect because they are specific substances, but a balance can measure the weight of any substance or object.

This question requires basic knowledge about the purpose and function of a balance. A balance is a device used to measure the weight or mass of an object. Option (A) is correct because a balance can measure the weight of sugar. Options (B), (C), and (D) are incorrect because a balance can measure the weight of solid objects, not liquids.
